description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method Spryker\Zed\ProductSearch\Business\ProductSearchFacade::runProductSearchConfigExtensionCollector() has 2 factory calls and violates the rule "Every Facade method should have no more than one factory call.".

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'hasTranslation' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'touchActive' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'bulkTouchSetActive' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
